item.description:
Hey All,

This years New years Eve party is going to be at Bill Millers Castle in Branford. $80/person, 150 for 2. Call 2036062727 and tell them that you are with partyexpress because we have 26 people going, and you could sit with us. We would love to have you join is.

The band is Solid Gold. Here is a link to the Bill Millers page.

This event includes a FIVE COURSE DINNER, and OPEN BAR ALL NIGHT!! I'm gonna splurge for new years eve. It's one night, and should be packed.

This is a 3 + multi-group Meetup.

The food is hosted by LaLuna who makes really good dinners.

Steve C.
item.name: New Years Eve Bash
